When customer order the ãPearl Bubble Teaã, it is your time to SHAKE IT ALL YOU CAN!ãControlãTouch panel with finger to make meal, and âshakeâ the handheld device to make pearl bubble tea.ãFeatureãâ»With new map unlock, more Taiwanese Special Cuisine can be make.â»New map will unlock when completing stages on a map. reviews.title: Fun but..
reviews.comment: I like this game, but it\'s too short! I don\'t want to pay for a game that only has 30 short levels!! Plz update more levels.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love the concept of this game. Paid for it, now I can\'t play @ all!?!?!? Keeps fc. I sent fc log, emailed dev, no response, I want my $$ back dbag.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rated -100 thumbs down!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Paid for the dang app and when I press play,  it keeps forcing close. Might as well keep playing the same dang levels on the free version since you cant play past the 5th level on the paid version.  Waste of money, 99 cents would be better spent on an old newspaper than this game.
reviews.author: Monisha Hamilton

reviews.title: Works okay for me
reviews.comment: Worked great for me! Love it because it\'s diff frm burgers n fries n I love these food in real life. 4 stars because it needs more maps n levels n can\'t transfer to sd. It really needs an update for more maps/levels.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: A short game, but love playing it. Need more stages.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The lite version is cool but when I bought the full version it forced closed immediately, Not Cool!! Please fix this soon!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Constantly Crashes
reviews.comment: I loved the lite version, I bought it, and now it constantly crashes and I can\'t play more then a couple levels.  LG Optimus.  Not worth the money.
reviews.author: Leasa Dobkins

reviews.title: Tea bar dash
reviews.comment: This game us nice but to to short. It needs more levels.
reviews.author: Rebecca Torres

reviews.title: Fun but...
reviews.comment: I love this game but it\'s so weird. I notice people are having a problem with the game not going through. I had the same problem but that was when I had my galaxy that was running on ICS. I just recently upgraded to the Note 2 and the game is fine. No force closes or anything. I think it may have to do with what OS the phone is currently on. Just to give you guys some sort of solution.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game but..
reviews.comment: Up data plz. We paid and there is only three stage. Up data~
